description: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: WinRM Access with Evil-WinRM
query: (process.executable:*\\ruby.exe AND process.command_line:*\-i\ * AND process.command_line:*\-u\ * AND process.command_line:*\-p\ *)
